name: Shoot Em Dead
description:
Shoot em Dead

This is it. A game about rage faces. A game for everyone:

  • People who love rage faces can finally play a game about them. For free. Whenever they want.
  • People who don't know rage faces yet can play this game to learn about their rich history.
  • People who hate rage faces can shoot them to pieces.

There's no reason not to play this game!

Source code and attributions available on GitHub.
